summary: * MPlayer: updated to the SVN version. * VLC: updated to 0.9.8a.  It now uses Qt for the GUI, which looks a   lot better than the wxWidgets one. * libdvdread, libdvdnav: updated to 4.1.3. * ffmpeg: updated to 0.5 (a new release!).  Got rid of the SVN   version, which shouldn't be necessary anymore.
